verses.name: Acts 20:34
verses.text: Yea, ye yourselves know, that these hands have ministered unto my necessities, and to them that were with me.

verses.name: Acts 20:35
verses.text: I have shewed you all things, how that so labouring ye ought to support the weak, and to remember the words of the Lord Jesus, how he said, It is more blessed to give than to receive.

verses.name: Acts 20:36
verses.text: And when he had thus spoken, he kneeled down, and prayed with them all.

verses.name: Acts 20:37
verses.text: And they all wept sore, and fell on Paul’s neck, and kissed him,
